Articles.Content:
This challenge will be an aggregation of different small challenges, I'll try to add a new challenge atleast every 2 days. I'm accepting ideas from you guys. If you participate in this challenge please make a new game if you plan to do more than one of these challenges.

And again I would love if you guys have ideas for new challenges!!!!!!!!!

Do you want to be a Judge?!

If you want to be part of the best judges in the (K)universe

PM me!

Information you need to add in the PM:

Name/Nickname:

Age:

Experience with KSP: (How long have you been playing where are you the best at?)

Skype/Teamspeak name or do you want to communicate via PM.

Speak Good English (Don't have to be a native speaker but it would be nice if you could communicate)

You can Still Participate if you are a judge, only you won't be able to give any points to your own entry

Want To Submit a Challenge?

Do you have a cool idea for a challenge? I would love to add it to this aggregation.

Requirments:

It has to somehow continue on the story.

For a valid Challenge you will need atleast

An Intro

The Requirments: Part that need to be added to the spacecraft.

Mission: What is the goal

Rating: (100 points to devide over the 3 goals)

You can participate in your own challenge although you will be noted that you were the creator because you had more to think about the challenge and how you will build your spacecraft.

Basic Challenge information.

You can participate to these Challenges any time or if else is told.

Other requirments for the Challenges are you have to post screenshots of your mission as a proof that you did it.

If you do one of the Challenges you will noted in the post.

Mods you can use are given within the Challenge

You will be rated on:

Looks of Spacecraft:

Efficiency: (How succesfull was the mission)

Time: (Did you go there in time?)

The amount of points per part is given with every challenge.

Mods: Mods that are needed for the challenge and optional mods that can be used.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Challenge: I

Intro:

Attention:

Satellite Jl-Bp07 Picked up unclassified seismic activity location Jool, Bop, 68o, 25' 22" N 243o 0' 0" W

We need brave team to go and define this unclassified data.

Requirements:

Unmanned Probe

Communotron 88-88

Double-C Seismic Accelerometer

No use of the LV-N Atomic Rocket Motor under 100,000 Meters.

Mission:

Send your Probe to Jool, Bop.

Land it at the given Coordinates.

Classify the threat.

Scoring:

Looks of Spacecraft: 40

Efficiency: 40

Time : 20

Mods:

Optional:

Flight Engineer

MechJeb

B9 (MAY NOT WORK)

FAR

Remote Tech
